main event: A witness observed a bluish object hovering near Corpus Christi and Robstown, Texas, around 9:30 - 10:00 pm, which appeared brighter than the moon.
interesting points: The object's shape varied from round to elongated,The object was estimated to be 1 to 2 miles away and at an altitude of 2,000 to 3,000 feet,No sound was heard during the observation,The witness noted a smaller object separated from the larger one,The object circled right to left at very high speed before disappearing.
sighted object: a bluish object resembling a brighter moon
